pr_title: Spring live testing - add variables tests.yml

timeline.bodyText:
Now we lack these accounts:

2 tenants.
2 users.
2 applications (one is single tenant, and another one is multi tenant).
timeline.author: chenrujun
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -30,3 +30,13 @@ jobs:
             safeName: azurespringboottestapplication
         EnvVars:
           AZURE_TEST_MODE: LIVE
+          AAD_TENANT_ID_1: $(java-spring-test-aad-tenant-id-1)
+          AAD_USER_NAME_1: $(java-spring-test-aad-user-name-1)
+          AAD_USER_PASSWORD_1: $(java-spring-test-aad-user-password-1)
+          AAD_TENANT_ID_2: $(java-spring-test-aad-tenant-id-2)
+          AAD_USER_NAME_2: $(java-spring-test-aad-user-name-2)
+          AAD_USER_PASSWORD_2: $(java-spring-test-aad-user-password-2)
+          AAD_MULTI_TENANT_CLIENT_ID: $(java-spring-test-aad-multi-tenant-client-id)
+          AAD_MULTI_TENANT_CLIENT_SECRET: $(java-spring-test-aad-multi-tenant-client-secret)
+          AAD_SINGLE_TENANT_CLIENT_ID: $(java-spring-test-aad-single-tenant-id)
+          AAD_SINGLE_TENANT_CLIENT_SECRET: $(java-spring-test-aad-single-tenant-secret)

replies.bodyText:
What is the relationship between tenants, users, and applications?
Should there be one application and one user in each tenant?

Tenant A

User 1
Application 1 (Single tenant)


Tenant B

User 2
Application 2 (Multi-tenant)
replies.author: danieljurek

timeline.message: add variables in spring live testing pipeline
add variables in spring live testing pipeline
Enable integration test and add AAD_SINGLE_TENANT_CLIENT_ID_WITH_ROLE.
Add 2 envVars about client with role.
Update environment name: remote 'test' in name.
